alert.note: Alert for Hodgeman; Pawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 12 at 3:56AM CST until January 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Hodgeman and Pawnee Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Sunday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
